duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform engineering design for telecommunication projects.
Design post-construction (As-built) plans and New Construction (New-Build) schematics for fiber, RF coax, and wireless projects.
Utilize proprietary design software through hands-on training i.e., Map Tools, Spatial Net Design Suite, Lode Data, and Job Tracking system.
Maintain customer-based compliance standards for the design and lifecycle of projects.

education_certification.credential: Working knowledge of Autodesk AutoCAD software.
Ability to read and understand architectural/engineering drawings.
Ability to manage, organize, and layout drawing requirements.
Understanding of architectural and construction detailing.
Flexibility to work overtime as needed.
